body:
[http://www.webdesignfromscratch.com/html-css/html-lists.php](http://www.webdesignfromscratch.com/html-css/html-lists.php) on this page's example of nested Unordered lists `
    ` list's code is not validating on [W3C validation](http://validator.w3.org/#validate_by_input) this is a code of this page [http://www.webdesignfromscratch.com/html-css/html-lists.php](http://www.webdesignfromscratch.com/html-css/html-lists.php)
    • Item one
    • Item two
    • Watch, you can easily nest list items: This item has some sub-items
      • Sub-item one
      • Sub-item two
      • Shall we do a 3rd nested list?
        • OK
        • Your browser should automatically use different bullet styles for each level.
    website owner should test code validity before and after writing code
title: Wrong example of nested <ul> <li> on very well known web design tutorial site
